title: Relais & Châteaux president says the hospitality association should have a wider presence in India
description: Relais & Châteaux plans to expand in India due to high trip spend. President Gardinier studies properties fitting association's DNA. Emphasis on local design and gastronomy. Top source markets are US, France, UK.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
